Protocol on DPRK-Russia Cooperation Signed 
   Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A protocol of the fourth meeting of the Inter-governmental Committee for Cooperation in Trade, Economy and Science and Technology between the DPRK and Russia was signed in Moscow on Mar. 23. It was signed by Rim Kyong Man, minister of Foreign Trade who is chairman of the DPRK side to the committee, and Konstantin Pulikovski, director of the Supervision Bureau of Ecology, Engineering and Atomic Energy who is chairman of the Russian side to the committee.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from South African Ambassador
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Mozambican President 
   Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to Armando Emilio Guebuza, President of Mozambique, in connection with the explosion that took place in its capital city, claiming big casualties. Expressing deep sympathy and consolation to the president and, through him, to the victims and their bereaved families, the message sincerely hoped that the Mozambican government would eradicate the aftermath of the accident as early as possible.

DPRK Ambassador to Cambodia Appointed 
   Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Ri In Sok was appointed as the DPRK ambassador e.p. to Cambodia, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
